original_title: Do You Love Me Like I Love You (Part 14: Dig, Lazarus, Dig!!!)
overview: A short film to accompany the reissue of Nick Cave & The Bad Seeds album Dig, Lazarus, Dig!!! (originally released in 2008). The result is a determinedly human portrait of the unique body of work produced by the band over the last 25 years, told through those who have lived and loved the music, including close collaborators.
title: Do You Love Me Like I Love You (Part 14: Dig, Lazarus, Dig!!!)
